snippet: Five climbers died Tuesday after reaching a summit in the Alps near the Italian border, the police said, then falling several hundred yards as they began to descend.
abstract: Five climbers die after falling several hundred yards as they begin their descent from an expedition in the Swiss Alps; names and nationalities are not available.
lead_paragraph: Five climbers died Tuesday after reaching a summit in the Alps near the Italian border, the police said, then falling several hundred yards as they began to descend.

headline.main: Switzerland: 5 Mountaineers Die in a Fall
headline.print_headline: Switzerland: 5 Mountaineers Die in a Fall
